arabic: تَابِعِ اللَّهُمَّ بَيْنَنَا وَ بَيْنَهُمْ بِالْخَيْرَاتِ
translation: O Allah, forgive the believer men and the believer women
and the Muslim men and the Muslim women,
And continue the connection of good between us and them;
indeed You are the acceptor of supplications
and You have power over everything
and only You are worthy of answering the prayers.
transliteration: tābi`illāhumma baynanā wa baynahum bil khayrāt
